  • Method Details

    • loadQuestions

      public boolean loadQuestions​(java.lang.String dataFile)
      Loads questions from the provided file.
      Parameters:
      dataFile - Name of the questions file.
      Returns:
      boolean True if questions were loaded successfully, False is not.

    • deliverQuiz

      public void deliverQuiz​(java.util.Scanner input)
      Delivers a quiz to the user using the currently loaded questions.
      Parameters:
      input - The Scanner to use for user input

    • deliverQuiz

      public void deliverQuiz​(boolean showIncorrectOnly, java.util.Scanner input)
      Delivers a quiz to the user using the currently loaded questions. Accepts an argument indicating whether all questions should be delivered, or only questions that were answered incorrectly.
      Parameters:
      showIncorrectOnly - True to display incorrect answers only, false to display all questions.
      input - The Scanner to use for user input

    • getCorrectCount

      public int getCorrectCount()
      Returns the number of answers currently marked correct.
      Returns:
      int Number of correct answers.

    • getIncorrectCount

      public int getIncorrectCount()
      Returns the number of answers currently marked incorrect.
      Returns:
      int Number of incorrect answers.

    • totalQuestions

      private int totalQuestions()
      Provides the number of questions currently loaded.
      Returns:
      int The number of questions.

    • displayGrade

      private void displayGrade​(int numQuestions, int numCorrect)
      Displays the results of the quiz.
      Parameters:
      numQuestions - Total number of quiz questions.
      numCorrect - Number of questions answered correctly.

    • isValidLine

      private boolean isValidLine​(java.lang.String line, int lineNum)
      Determines if the line is a properly delimited question. Used to check for bad lines before validating specific conditions.
      Parameters:
      line - The line to validate.
      lineNum - The line number in the file.
      Returns:
      boolean True if line if valid, false if not

    • isValidChoice

      Parameters:
      answer - Answer
      numChoices - Number of choices
      Returns:
      boolean True if choice is valid, false if not.
